meanings.sent1: In the early morning, the dewfalls gently onto the grass.
meanings.sent2: The dewfalls are most noticeable at dawn.
meanings.sent3: The dewfalls seemed to dance as they landed on the leaves.
meanings.sent4: As the sun rose, the dewfalls sparkled like tiny diamonds.
meanings.sent5: I love watching the dewfalls cascade down in the morning.

meanings.definition: The time of day when dew forms.
meanings.sent1: At dawn, the dewfalls begin to appear on the petals.
meanings.sent2: The dewfalls in the early morning make everything look fresh.
meanings.sent3: The dewfalls at sunrise always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: The dewfalls of dawn bring a sense of renewal to the world.
meanings.sent5: I enjoy the peacefulness of the dewfalls in the morning light.

meanings.definition: A light covering of dew on the ground.
meanings.sent1: The grass was covered in a delicate layer of dewfalls.
meanings.sent2: Walking through the meadow, I could feel the dewfalls under my feet.
meanings.sent3: The dewfalls on the ground made the field look like it was dusted with sugar.
meanings.sent4: The dewfalls on the lawn glistened in the early sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The dewfalls on the ground made the morning walk refreshing.
